title: Four Lost Cities
description:
Author and science journalist, Annalee Newitz joins Felix Salmon and Emily Peck to talk about their new book Four Lost Cities: A Secret History of the Urban Age, electric vehicles and why the internet may be doomed. 
 
In the Slate Plus segment: The payments infrastructure in the US. 

Email: slatemoney@slate.com

Podcast production by Jessamine Molli.

Twitter: @felixsalmon, @EmilyRPeck
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
